clauses.title: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to the user
clauses.description: The Agreements can be updated at any time, including in a way that negatively affects user rights, without notifying before or after the changes.
clauses.clause_text: Within the limits of applicable law, the Company reserves the right to review and change these Terms and Conditions at any time. You are responsible for regularly reviewing these Terms and Conditions. Continued use of the Service after such changes shall constitute your consent to such changes.

case.text: Terms may be changed any time at their discretion, without notice to you

clauses.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
clauses.description: The Service infers your acceptance from your continued usage, instead of prompting you to read the new Terms and asking for direct consent. This doesn’t apply to services that have no way to seek consent from users through their contact details or an account.
clauses.clause_text: Continued use of the Service will be deemed as acceptance of such changes.

case.text: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent to changes of terms merely from your usage.

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text: We only use analytics software to collect aggregated non-identifying information, such as: title of the page being viewed, screen resolution, outlinks, referrers, and page and website speed

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
clauses.clause_text:
Furthermore, if the result of the dispute or chargeback mechanisms causes the Company to be liable for an amount exceeding the price paid for the service (e.g.
dispute fee), you authorize the Company to charge that amount on your account

case.text: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

clauses.title: This service does not track you
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".
clauses.clause_text: We do not do any targeted advertising or any profiling.

case.text: You are not being tracked

clauses.title: This service has a no VPN logs policy
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that periodically delete their logs to prevent user sessions being tracked over time.
clauses.clause_text:
hen you use the Service, we do NOT do any of the following:

  • Log users’ traffic or the content of any communications
  • Discriminate against devices, protocols, or applications
  • Throttle your Internet connection

You can find details about our no-logs VPN policy here.

case.text: Logs are deleted after a finite period of time

clauses.title: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked
clauses.description: The Service disclaims that IP adresses from users are not collected (or anonymized) nor shared.
clauses.clause_text: This data cannot be used to personally identify users or visitors as we do not log IP addresses and connect them to specific user accounts.

case.text: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

clauses.title: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis
clauses.clause_text: We will only disclose the limited user data we possess when compelled by law for the purposes of the prevention, investigation, detection or prosecution of criminal offences or the execution of criminal penalties, including the safeguarding against and the prevention of threats to public security.

case.text: Third parties are not allowed to access your personal information without a legal basis

clauses.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: Through the Service, you can directly access, edit, delete or export personal data processed by the Company in your use of the Service.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you
clauses.description: The cookies used only collect anonymous, aggregated data that cannot be linked to a unique identity.
clauses.clause_text: How do we collect non-personal website data: We may use various cookies to collect and store information when you visit our website.

case.text: The cookies used by this service do not contain information that would personally identify you

clauses.title: The service's data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.
clauses.clause_text: Data retention: We retain essential data (such as username, email, billing information) on active accounts in order to provide services. This data is deleted when your account is deleted.

case.text: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes

clauses.title: The service does not share user information with third parties
clauses.description: Information collected from users by this service is not given to third parties.
clauses.clause_text: Your email address is not shared with any third parties.

case.text: Your personal data is not shared with third parties

clauses.title: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.
clauses.description: The Terms are governed by the applicable laws of a jurisdiction known for protecting citizens privacy with strong data regulations. Usually contributors will need to explain in the Analysis view of each point linked to this Case why the jurisdiction is friendly to user privacy protection.
clauses.clause_text: These Terms and Conditions shall be governed in all respects by the substantive laws of Switzerland.

case.text: The court of law governing the terms is in a jurisdiction that is friendlier to user privacy protection.

clauses.title: The service promises to inform and/or notify users regarding government inquiries that may involve users' personal data
clauses.description: In case the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they will make reasonable efforts to inform/notify the user (e.g. warrant canary).
clauses.clause_text:
Foreign authorities' data requests must be approved by competent Swiss authorities.

Under Swiss law, it is obligatory to notify the target of a surveillance request, although such notification may come from the authorities and not from the Company.

case.text: The service promises to inform and/or notify you regarding government inquiries that may involve your personal data

clauses.title: Only necessary user logs are kept by the service to ensure quality
clauses.description: Logs are text files containing some information about web visitors, such as user agents (showing for instance that you're connecting from Firefox for Android) and ip addresses (which reveal your approximate location). This case applies to Services that only keep the strictly necessary logs on their servers and therefore protect your privacy.
clauses.clause_text: ProtonVPN respects its users’ privacy and enforces a no-logs policy

case.text: Only necessary logs are kept by the service to ensure quality

clauses.title: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis
clauses.description: Users know the date the privacy policy was last updated and can thus infer the next time it will be reviewed. This gives users more certainty about how long they can trust the current policy to apply.
clauses.clause_text: The Company reserves the right to periodically review and change this Policy, and will notify users who have enabled the notification preference about any change.

case.text: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis

clauses.title: Users are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service
clauses.clause_text: At its sole discretion, the Company may also provide the account holders with a prorated refund for service fees paid during the period the Service was not available or usable, upon the request of the account holder.

case.text: You are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service

clauses.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data
clauses.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.
clauses.clause_text: In case of violation of your rights, you have the right to lodge a complaint to the competent supervisory authority.

case.text: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data
